tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Shanti Reddy is our regular pediatrician for both our children .For the past five years, we are consulting her for our children health-care.  We are extremely satisfied with her treatment methods and her way of dealing with both child and the parent.  This time we have  visited her for our 5 year child who was suffering from high fever. She realized that the child is not responding to oral antibiotics and has been put on iv antibiotics quickly.  Also we would like to appreciate the nursing team who were assisting Dr. Shanti Reddy,  especially sister Divya  who did a commendable . They were very friendly and compassionate with all the kids and parents. Kudos to the whole team..Keep up the good job..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Hi I am Ashwini Mandlik, my daughter Krisha born in Ovum Hospital. We liked the hospital, doctors and Staff very much here. 

My daughter was having  persistent jaundice. While regular checkup with Dr. Shanthi she suspected liver disease. I wants to say special thanks to Dr. Shanthi and hospital staff for providing the all doctor references and support for her treatment.  

Even though we were seeing liver specialist, we always preferred to see Dr. Shanthi and we felt very comfortable comming to ovum hospital since wait time is very less than other hospitals. Staff also very nice, very friendly and very supportive. 

I have been to multiple hospitals for my daughters treatment but I feel Ovum Hospital is the best of you want good treatment, good service and overall good experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We are coming here for my son from last 4 yrs  . Dr Shanthi  is very good doctor. She explains  everything regarding child‚Äôs health in very friendly manner. She listens the problems calmly.I would like to recommend to others also. Thanks doctor Shanthi Reddy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
This is our second baby consultation with Dr. Shanthi Reddy & we are blessed extremely happy with her advise & guidance on hat she has been giving us on our parenthood. Will strongly recommend the doctor.

The staff at the reception desk is always helpful especially Mr.Kiran & all the staff Nurses

High wait time and unresponsive staff.
Kept us waiting for hours even with the oppointment to see the doctor.
